name: Medical Supplies Classification
description: Comprehensive classification dataset for medical equipment and supplies with 10 distinct categories

classes.name: Diagnostic Equipment
classes.description: Medical devices used for diagnosis and monitoring
examples:
PRODUCT: MediTemp Pro Digital Thermometer
Model: MT-2024
Features: Infrared non-contact measurement, fever alert system with color-coded display, memory for last 20 readings
Accuracy: ±0.2°C (±0.4°F)
Measurement Range: 32.0°C to 42.9°C (89.6°F to 109.2°F)
Response Time: 1 second
Battery Life: 3000+ measurements
FDA Approved: Yes
Ideal for: Hospitals, clinics, home use
Warranty: 2 years manufacturer warranty

classes.name: Surgical Instruments
classes.description: Tools and instruments used in surgical procedures
examples:
PRODUCT: SurgiCut Premium Surgical Scissors
Model: SC-125-CVD
Blade Length: 12.5 cm (5 inches)
Material: German stainless steel with titanium coating
Tip Design: Curved, sharp/blunt configuration
Sterilization: Autoclavable up to 134°C, gamma radiation compatible
Finish: Satin finish to reduce glare
Handle: Ergonomic finger rings with non-slip texture
Application: General surgery, tissue cutting, suture removal
Packaging: Individual sterile packaging
Compliance: ISO 13485, CE marked
Shelf Life: 5 years when properly stored

classes.name: Medical Consumables
examples:
PRODUCT: SafeGuard Nitrile Examination Gloves
Model: SG-NIT-100
Material: 100% nitrile rubber, latex-free, powder-free
Thickness: 4.0 mil (0.10 mm) for enhanced tactile sensitivity
Sizes Available: XS, S, M, L, XL
Color: Blue with textured fingertips for improved grip
Compliance: FDA 510(k) cleared, ASTM D6319 tested
Packaging: 100 gloves per box, 10 boxes per case
Shelf Life: 5 years from manufacture date
Applications: Medical examinations, laboratory work, infection control
Features: Puncture resistant, chemical splash protection, ambidextrous design
Certifications: ISO 13485, CE marked, AQL 1.5

classes.name: Patient Monitoring
classes.description: Devices for continuous patient monitoring and vital signs tracking
examples:
PRODUCT: VitalWatch Continuous Patient Monitor
Model: VW-5000-ICU
Display: 15-inch high-resolution touchscreen with customizable layouts
Parameters: ECG (12-lead), SpO2, NIBP, IBP, Temperature, Respiration, CO2
Alarms: Configurable audio/visual alarms with escalation protocols
Data Storage: 72-hour trend data, 1000+ alarm events
Connectivity: Hospital network integration, HL7 compatibility
Battery: 4-hour backup power, hot-swappable battery system
Certifications: FDA 510(k), IEC 60601-1, CE marked
Mounting: Mobile cart, wall mount, or bedside rail options
User Interface: Multi-language support, customizable user profiles
Warranty: 3 years parts and labor, 24/7 technical support

classes.name: Rehabilitation Equipment
classes.description: Equipment for physical therapy and patient rehabilitation
examples:
PRODUCT: FlexiTherapy Multi-Station Rehabilitation System
Model: FT-REHAB-2024
Stations: 8 exercise stations with adjustable resistance
Resistance Range: 5-200 lbs pneumatic resistance system
Exercises: Upper/lower extremity, core strengthening, balance training
Adjustability: Height, angle, and resistance fully adjustable
Safety Features: Emergency stop buttons, safety straps, non-slip surfaces
Display: Digital feedback system showing reps, time, and progress
Construction: Heavy-duty steel frame with medical-grade upholstery
Dimensions: 12' x 8' x 8' (L x W x H)
Capacity: Supports patients up to 350 lbs
Compliance: ADA compliant, FDA registered
Warranty: 5 years structural, 2 years electronics
Installation: Professional installation and staff training included

classes.name: Laboratory Equipment
classes.description: Equipment for medical testing and laboratory analysis
examples:
PRODUCT: LabMax Automated Chemistry Analyzer
Model: LM-CHEM-800
Throughput: 800 tests per hour with STAT priority handling
Test Menu: 100+ chemistry assays including cardiac markers, liver function, lipids
Sample Types: Serum, plasma, urine, CSF
Sample Volume: 2-35 μL depending on test
Reagent Management: Onboard refrigerated reagent storage for 25 reagents
Calibration: Automatic calibration with quality control integration
Connectivity: LIS/HIS integration, barcode scanning
Maintenance: Automated daily maintenance routines
Results: Real-time result reporting with delta checks
Certifications: CLIA waived tests available, FDA 510(k) cleared
Dimensions: 48" x 30" x 42" (L x W x H)
Power: 110-240V, 50/60Hz universal power supply

classes.name: Emergency Medical Equipment
classes.description: Critical care equipment for emergency and trauma situations
examples:
PRODUCT: LifeSaver Emergency Defibrillator/Monitor
Model: LS-DEFIB-AED-Pro
Defibrillation: Biphasic waveform, 2-200 Joules energy range
Monitoring: 3/5/12-lead ECG, SpO2, NIBP, temperature
Pacing: External transcutaneous pacing 30-180 ppm
Display: 8-inch color LCD with waveform display
Battery: Lithium-ion, 4+ hours continuous monitoring
Data: 8+ hours of patient data storage, event summary
Connectivity: WiFi/Bluetooth for data transfer
Durability: IP55 rated, drop tested to 1.5 meters
Weight: 8.2 lbs including battery
Compliance: FDA cleared, AHA guidelines compliant
Accessories: Adult/pediatric pads, carrying case, training materials
Warranty: 8 years or 1000 shocks, comprehensive service plan available

classes.name: Imaging Equipment
classes.description: Medical imaging devices for diagnostic purposes
examples:
PRODUCT: ClearView Portable Ultrasound System
Model: CV-US-2024-Pro
Transducers: Linear, convex, phased array, and endocavitary probes included
Frequency Range: 2-15 MHz with harmonic imaging
Display: 21.5-inch LED monitor with touch interface
Imaging Modes: B-mode, M-mode, Color Doppler, Power Doppler, 3D/4D
Image Quality: High-resolution beamforming with speckle reduction
Storage: 500GB internal storage, DICOM 3.0 compatible
Connectivity: USB, Ethernet, WiFi, DICOM print/store
Battery: 3-hour continuous scanning capability
Weight: 15 lbs main unit, portable design
Applications: Cardiology, OB/GYN, abdominal, vascular, MSK
Certifications: FDA 510(k), CE marked, ISO 13485
Training: Comprehensive training program and clinical applications support

classes.name: Sterilization Equipment
classes.description: Equipment for sterilizing medical instruments and supplies
examples:
PRODUCT: SteriliMax Autoclave Sterilization System
Model: SM-AUTO-450L
Chamber Size: 450 liters (24" x 24" x 48")
Sterilization Cycles: Steam, pre-vacuum, liquid, flash sterilization
Temperature Range: 121°C to 134°C with ±1°C accuracy
Pressure: 15-30 PSI operating range
Cycle Time: 15-60 minutes depending on load and cycle type
Drying: Post-sterilization vacuum drying system
Validation: Built-in biological and chemical indicator testing
Recording: Digital data logging with printout capability
Safety: Automatic door locking, pressure relief systems
Construction: Stainless steel chamber and piping
Utilities: Steam, compressed air, water, electrical connections required
Compliance: FDA registered, ASME pressure vessel certified
Warranty: 2 years parts and labor, preventive maintenance program available

classes.name: Anesthesia Equipment
classes.description: Equipment for anesthesia delivery and patient sedation
examples:
PRODUCT: AnesFlow Advanced Anesthesia Workstation
Model: AF-AWS-3000
Ventilation: Volume/pressure controlled, SIMV, pressure support modes
Gas Delivery: Isoflurane, sevoflurane, desflurane vaporizers
Monitoring: Capnography, pulse oximetry, airway pressure, gas analysis
Safety Systems: Oxygen failure protection, hypoxic guard, scavenging system
Display: 19-inch touchscreen with integrated patient monitoring
Compliance: Automatic pre-use checkout, leak testing, calibration
Alarms: Comprehensive alarm system with audio/visual indicators
Data Management: Electronic anesthesia records, trend data storage
Mobility: Mobile cart with locking casters and cable management
Power: Uninterruptible power supply with battery backup
Certifications: FDA 510(k), IEC 60601-2-13, CE marked
Service: 24/7 technical support, comprehensive service contracts available
Training: Clinical education and competency programs included
